attributes.action: Start thinking about the population that cannot claim travel expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present regime  wish to increase vehicle excise duty whilst neglecting spiraling fuel costs. The effect on rural communities, where there is not the option of public transport,has a crippling effect. Lower incomes, increased commuting costs, poorly maintained roads will lead to an increased level of dissatisfaction. It appears that the increase in Vehicle Excise Duty for rural residents will have a greater effect not only on the wallet but on ones legal right to move about the country. The majority of tax payers cannot reclaim fuel costs and increases in road tax , politicians can...Corruption you decide

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
